name: fairy-gem
effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging Fairy move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging Fairy move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A gem with an essence of the fey.
When held, it strengthens the power
of a Fairy-type move one time.
